name: Glacial Beer
description:
An item used to increase Rapport with NPCs.

A special beer only found in Shushire area. It was made with the iceberg water of Shushire that is high in oxygen, so it is known that it has second-to-none cool, refreshing quality. It is best served with bits of the iceberg still floating on the surface.

Kaysarr and Dath would love this.
